actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to repeal the requirement of user charges.

summary.text: Repeals the requirement that State and local governments adopt a system to recover from users the costs of operation and maintenance of publicly owned waste treatment works as a condition for the approval by the Administrator of the Enevironmental Protection Agency of grants to State and local governments for the construction of such works pursuant to the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to repeal the requirement of user charges.
